member.name: T:System.Collections.Generic.ForEachExtension
member.summary: Exposes a ForEach<T> extension method on IEnumerable<T>, just like List<T> does.

member.name: M:System.Collections.Generic.ForEachExtension.ForEach``1(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0},System.Action{``0})
member.summary: Iterates all source elements and executes the given action for each.
member.param: The source of items to iterate.
The action to execute for each item in the source.
